./email_cron.pl

   1 #!/usr/bin/perl -w
   2 use strict;
   3 
   4 use VulnDB;
   5 
   6 my $vdb = VulnDB->new();
   7 
   8 # loop through all users that have email selected as an alert method
   9 my @user_hash_refs = @{$vdb->user_mgr->get_auth_user( query => [ is_active => 1 ] )};
  10 
  11 for my $user_hash_ref (@user_hash_refs) {
  12     my @msgs = @{$vdb->find_msgs_by_user($user_hash_ref, [is_mailed => 0])};
  13     my $num_msgs = @msgs;
  14     next if $num_msgs == 0;
  15     
  16     # skip mailing if user does not have mail selected as an alert delivery method
  17     my $user_profile_ref = $user_hash_ref->user_profile;
  18     my @alert_method_refs = @{$user_profile_ref->alertmethods};
  19     my $wants_mail = 0;
  20     for my $alertmethod_ref (@alert_method_refs) {
  21         $wants_mail = 1 if ( $alertmethod_ref->name eq 'mail');
  22     }
  23     next if $wants_mail == 0;
  24 
  25     # format email
  26     use VulnEmail;
  27     my $ve = VulnEmail->new( { msgs => \@msgs, username => $user_hash_ref->username } );
  28     my $email = $ve->format_as_html;
  29 
  30     # send email
  31     my ($day, $month, $year) = (localtime)[3,4,5];
  32     $day = "0".$day if ($day <= 9);
  33     $month = "0".$month if ($month <= 9);
  34     $year += 1900;
  35     my $subject = "advisoryscan.net Digest for " . $year . "/" . $month . "/" . $day;
  36     print $user_hash_ref->email . "\n";
  37     $ve->send_email( { subject => $subject, email => $user_hash_ref->email, body => $email } );
  38 
  39 }
  40 
  41 # set all new messages (is_mailed=0) to is_mailed=1
  42 my @msgs = @{$vdb->message_mgr->get_message( query => [ is_mailed => 0 ] )};
  43 for my $msg (@msgs) {
  44     $msg->{is_mailed} = 1;
  45     $msg->save();
  46 }
  47 
  48
